pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,1,1557426960,mojeIKP - log in to health,Centrum e-Zdrowia,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/mojeikp-log-in-to-health/id1557426960?uo=4,0.0,4.83076,76508,Health & Fitness,"mojeIKP is a free application from the Polish Ministry of Health. Install and receive e-referrals, e-prescriptions and e-orders for medical devices right on your phone. Show the QR code at a pharmacy and fill an e-prescription without providing your PESEL (Polish resident identification number). Review your treatment history. Set a reminder to take the medication. Check the medication's leaflet by scanning its packaging. Grant access to your Electronic Medical Records (EDM) to medical staff and facilities. Apply for an EHIC or a replacement certificate for the EHIC. In an emergency, use the rescue function, which will provide step-by-step instructions on how to provide first aid. Have important healthcare phones on hand. Enjoy a free exercise program, pedometer, hydration counter and access to a diet portal.
Basic functionality:

column2: buying a medication at a pharmacy without having to provide your PESEL number, just let the pharmacist scan the QR code
quick and convenient access to e-prescriptions and e-referrals by phone, directly from the PUSH notification received
reviewing the history of visits and examinations
review of e-orders for medical devices
access to the preventive program ""My Health""
checking the statusdostęp do programu profilaktycznego ""moje zdrowie"" of the right to NFZ benefits
possibility to check the dosage of the prescribed medication
possibility to set a reminder to take a medicine
access to the medication leaflet after scanning the package code
downloading e-prescriptions and e-referrals as a pdf file, which can be sent to relatives or medical staff by e-mail or text message
granting access to your Electronic Medical Records (EDM) to medical staff and facilities
applying for the EHIC and the certificate temporarily replacing the EHIC
access to the Individual Medical Care Plan (IPOM)
access to children's medical records
e-registration for specialist appointments, COVID-19 vaccination, HPV vaccination, and preventive screenings
calculating the risk of death from cardiovascular diseases
access to information on how to give first aid
quick access to diets prepared by the Polish National Health Fund (NFZ), including recipes and shopping lists
quiz on prevention
8 weeks to health"" training program
information about the number of steps taken integrated with the Health app
support for proper hydration of the body

column1: pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,2,1011095795,Fitatu Calorie Counter & Diet,Fitatu sp. z o.o.,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/fitatu-calorie-counter-diet/id1011095795?uo=4,0.0,4.84651,75270,Health & Fitness,"New at Fitatu - AI calorie estimation from a photo!

Take it to the next level and forget about manually entering ingredients. Now just a photo and a few seconds is all you need! Powered by artificial intelligence, our algorithm instantly estimates the calories and macronutrients of the meals you consume – whether at home or dining out.
This is a true revolution in calorie counting!

Fitatu – Your daily healthy lifestyle assistant! Our app makes it easy to count calories, track macronutrients, and monitor hydration, helping you achieve your health and fitness goals. With thousands of recipes, personalized meal plans, and intermittent fasting features, Fitatu supports you every step of the way – now also on Apple Watch! See how easily you can control your diet and health with Fitatu.
Fitatu features that will help you achieve your goal:
- Calculate appropriate caloric intake and ratios of proteins, fats, and carbohydrates with a forecast for goal achievement.
- Detailed information on nutrient intake (calories, proteins, fats, carbohydrates), including 39 vitamins and elements such as omega 3, fiber, sodium, cholesterol, caffeine.

- The largest database of products and dishes moderated by dietitians, including products from store chains (e.g. Tesco, Asda, Morrisons, Sainsbury, Lidl) and dishes from restaurant chains (e.g., McDonald’s, KFC, Subway, Pizza Hut).
- Thousands of healthy recipes with step-by-step instructions and photos.
- Barcode scanner.
- AI Calorie Estimation - quickly determine the caloric content of meals you consume at home and outside.
- Menu - 7 ready-made meal menus: Balance, Vege, Less sugar, Keto, Gluten free and High-protein.
- Intermittent Fasting - an animated counter will help you smoothly enter the rhythm of fasting and eating windows. Choose from 4 types of fasting: 16:8, 8:16, 14:10, 20:4.
- Fridge - enter the ingredients you have and we'll show you what you can cook from them.
- Fulfill daily goal - we will help you fulfill the remaining daily requirements for calories and macronutrients.
- Shopping list - Automatically created based on the planned menu.
- Water intake tracking with reminder options.
- Health and well-being notes - record how you feel. Along with notes, 52 proprietary icons.
- Habits - Choose from 22 proposals you can carry out for 90 days. Track progress and maintain motivation.
- Summaries of calorie and nutrient intake for the day, week, or any period, including monitoring the intake of any nutrient.
- Body mass and measurements tracking. With charts and an indication of the forecast for goal achievement.
- Carbohydrate exchanges - now with Fitatu, planning a diet for diabetics is much easier!
- Copying day - speed up meal planning for repeating days.
- Deleting the entire day - removes all meals from a given day.
- Ability to set different goals for training days.
- Ability to set meal times and notifications.
- Data downloading from Google Fit, Garmin Connect, FitBit, Samsung Health, Huawei Health, and Strava.
- Data import from installed phone apps Adidas Running by Runtastic and Zepp Life (formerly MiFit) via Google Fit (connection setup required).
- Data export to any program or to XLS/CSV file.
- Additional backup/export option - sending data to Google Fit about what you eat and how much you weigh.
- Access also through WWW at www.fitatu.com.
Counting calories has never been so easy, download the app and see for yourself!
https://www.fitatu.com/app/regulations
https://www.fitatu.com/app/privacy-policy",2015-08-04T16:35:19Z,2025-11-12T08:58:01Z

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,3,1038369065,Flo Period & Cycles Tracker,FLO HEALTH UK LIMITED,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/flo-period-cycles-tracker/id1038369065?uo=4,0.0,4.80222,84749,Health & Fitness,"Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.
Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.
With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.
With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts
New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.
Start tracking your cycle for free today.
Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy
https://flo.health/terms-of-use
Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.
Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.
If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.
Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.",2015-10-03T22:28:36Z,2025-11-19T19:58:17Z

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,4,1593364930,ZdrowAppka,Benefit Systems SA,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/zdrowappka/id1593364930?uo=4,0.0,4.89227,30587,Health & Fitness,"Pobierz darmową aplikację ZdrowAppka – Przewodnik zdrowego stylu życia!
Ćwicz i dbaj o kondycję tak jak lubisz, a my zajmiemy się resztą!
Aplikacja przeznaczona dla użytkowników klubów fitness sieci: Zdrofit, My Fitness Place, Fabryka Formy, Fitness Academy i Fit Fabric.
ZdrowAppka to pierwsza taka aplikacja, która daje Ci możliwość:
- korzystania z porad zdrowotnych,
- wejścia bez karty na siłownie,
- rezerwacji zajęć fitness.
W aplikacji ZdrowAppka znajdziesz niezbędne rozwiązania, które przydadzą się każdej osobie chcącej zadbać o zdrowy tryb życia - nieważne, czy jest początkująca, czy już zaprawiona w boju.
Co zyskasz dzięki nowej aplikacji?

1) Wejście do klubu bez karty. ZdrowAppka umożliwia wejście do każdego klubu naszej sieci fitness bez karty, z której korzystasz obecnie. Nie masz przy sobie karty? Żaden problem! Teraz potrzebujesz jedynie telefonu.

2) Łatwe zapisy na zajęcia fitness. W nowej aplikacji w bardzo prosty i intuicyjny sposób zarezerwujesz zajęcia w klubie, który jest najbliżej Ciebie. Nie było miejsc? Zapisz się na listę rezerwową. Gdy tylko pojawi się nowy grafik, otrzymasz powiadomienie oraz możliwość rejestracji na wybrane ćwiczenia.

3) Zarządzanie swoim karnetem. ZdrowAppka daje Ci możliwość zarządzania swoim kontem bez ograniczeń. Już teraz możesz za pomocą aplikacji dokonywać płatności oraz sprawdzać szczegółowe informacje dotyczące Twojego karnetu.

4) Indeks zdrowia. W aplikacji znajdziesz parametry, które na bieżąco określają indeks Twojego zdrowia: liczbę kroków, godziny przeznaczone na sen, podjęte aktywności, ćwiczenia oraz treningi. Dostaniesz również przypomnienia o konieczności wykonania konkretnych badań.
5) Oceny treningów oraz klubów fitness. W nowej aplikacji masz możliwość oceny klubu, w którym ćwiczysz, zajęć, w których uczestniczysz, a nawet instruktora, który je prowadzi.
ZdrowAppka – aplikacja największej sieci fitness klubów w Polsce – to prawdziwe centrum dowodzenia Twoim zdrowym stylem życia w telefonie!
Zawsze pod ręką, dostępna 24 godziny na dobę, przez 7 dni w tygodniu - dla Twojej wygody i komfortu.
Dostępne wersje językowe: polski, angielski i ukraiński.
Daj nam znać, co myślisz o aplikacji ZdrowAppka – Twoja ocena jest dla nas bardzo ważna.",2022-05-04T07:00:00Z,2025-11-20T12:29:29Z

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,5,1200020785,Zdrowe Zakupy,QPONY PL SP Z O O,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/zdrowe-zakupy/id1200020785?uo=4,0.0,4.89032,35130,Health & Fitness,"Pobierz darmową aplikację Zdrowe Zakupy. Zeskanuj kod kreskowy produktu i dowiedz, jakie szkodliwe składniki zawiera oraz jak wpływają na Twój organizm. Dzięki aplikacji Zdrowe Zakupy pełna analiza składu.
podręczny skaner kodów kreskowych
- ponad 1 300 000 produktów w bazie
- ponad 350 zdefiniowanych składników
- skanowanie kosmetyków
- możesz dodawać produkty i weryfikować składniki
- możesz sprawdzić alternatywne produkty
- możesz wybrać składniki występujące w produktach, o których chcesz zostać poinformowany

Zdrowe Zakupy to idealna aplikacja dla osób, które stawiają na zdrowe jedzenie i zdrowe odżywianie. Zdrowa żywność i zdrowe produkty w Twoim domu. Skaner kodów kreskowych odczyta Twój produkt i otrzymasz skład - analiza składu. Dzięki aplikacji łatwo unikniesz szkodliwych składników zawartych w produktach.

Już teraz możesz skanować kosmetyki i sprawdzać ich skład, by wybrać te najlepsze! Każdy składnik posiada przypisany mu poziom ryzyka dla zdrowia. Klikając w nazwę konkretnej substancji, dowiesz się więcej na temat każdego składnika.

W aplikacji sprawdzisz skład oraz wartości odżywcze produktów. Dostępna jest również ogólna ocena produktu - szybko sprawdzisz, jak oceniliśmy produkt. Aplikacja pokazuje wartości odżywcze: wartość energetyczna (kalorie), tłuszcze, kwasy tłuszczowe nasycone, cukry, białko, błonnik pokarmowy, sól.

Aplikacja zdrowe jedzenie zawiera w swojej bazie ponad 1 300 000 produktów, których skład sprawdzisz szybko i łatwo podczas zakupów. Każdy produkt zawiera dokładny spis składników, opis każdego z nich i informację, w jakim stopniu jest szkodliwy oraz ogólną ocenę produktu Codziennie aktualizujemy bazę produktów oraz składników. Jeśli brakuje jakiegoś produktu, możesz go dodać i będzie dostępny dla Ciebie oraz pozostałych użytkowników.
Kategorie produktów:
Owoce i warzywa
Nabiał i jaja
Pieczywo i cukiernia
Mięso, ryby, garmaż
Artykuły spożywcze
Mrożonki
Napoje
Dla dzieci
Kosmetyki

Dzięki aplikacji dowiesz się które produkty zawierają sztuczne konserwanty, emulgatory, stabilizatory, zagęstniki oraz inne E składniki które mogą mieć niekorzystny wpływ na Twoje samopoczucie. Ponadto, możesz wykluczyć produkty zawierające alergeny lub inne składniki, których chcesz uniknąć takie jak np. GMO, MOM, gluten, orzechy, laktoza, cukier.

Postaw na zdrowe odżywianie, zdrowa dieta i korzystaj z aplikacji. Skanuj produkty, rób zakupy z głową, wybieraj zdrowe produkty! Nie czytaj etykiet, uruchom skaner kodów kreskowych, zeskanuj kod i sprawdź dokładny skład produktu. Zdrowe zakupy kod kreskowy, zdrowa żywność skaner,  aplikacja zdrowa żywność. Otrzymasz szybką informację na temat interesującego Cię produktu oraz poznasz jego alternatywy.
Korzystanie ze Zdrowych Zakupów jest naprawdę proste - weź produkt, zeskanuj kod kreskowy, sprawdź skład i gotowe. Pobierz apkę i wypróbuj teraz!",2017-01-30T12:05:05Z,2024-11-14T13:19:44Z

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,6,6474852610,HUAWEI Health: Europe,Aspiegel SE,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/huawei-health-europe/id6474852610?uo=4,0.0,4.84276,4369,Health & Fitness,"The brand new ""HUAWEI Health: Europe"" app has been launched to bring the ""HUAWEI Health+"" membership features to all users across Europe, such as ""Workouts"", ""Yoga"", ""Mindful Meditation"", and ""Sleep Music"".

Your go-to, integrated health and fitness companion. Whether you want to kick-start your fitness life, keep track of your health, or conveniently manage your smart wearable devices, the Huawei Health app has what you're looking for. Keep your data private, or share it with your loved ones, the power's yours. The latest in health and fitness technology, made simple, secure, and easy to use.
Keeps Up with Your Every Move

Keep track of your health journey. Huawei Health records your activity, supporting over 100 different sports, from beginner to advanced levels. See your workout data clearly every step of the way, so you can be sure you're reaching your goals. A wonderful world of fitness at the tip of your fingers.
Run How You Want
A simpler way to run that can benefit anyone. The app is able to record and map out your route as you're running, all while displaying key information so you can stay on target.
An Amazing Journey

Share your health journey with your friends and family. Your outdoor workout routes can be generated into videos with music for you to proudly share. Use Dynamic tracking to create videos to share on social media to inspire yourself and others with your fitness journey.
A New View on Health

See your life in amazing detail with Huawei Health stats. The app keeps records of your heart rate, weight, sleep quality, step count and more. All your data is shown in clear, dynamic graphs so you have a better understanding of your health in a more accessible way.
[health package]
·Synchronize with the weight data in healthkit. When you use the healthy weight data of Huawei mobile phone, this data will be synchronized and recorded in healthkit.

·Synchronize with motion data in healthkit. You can automatically synchronize the exercise data recorded in Huawei health to healthkit. Similarly, Huawei sports health can also obtain the exercise data from healthkit.
Huawei Health app is not intended for medical use, and all data is for reference only.
You should seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.
--Automatic renewal service agreement(EULA): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/monservice-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN

--Membership Agreement (including user privacy agreement): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/member-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN",2024-06-29T07:00:00Z,2025-11-19T09:11:12Z

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,7,426826309,"Strava: Run, Bike, Walk",Strava Inc.,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/strava-run-bike-walk/id426826309?uo=4,0.0,4.6353,5018,Health & Fitness,"Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:
• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.
• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.
• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.
• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.
• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.
• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.
• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).
• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.
• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.
• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.
Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.
Terms of Service: https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy",2011-03-24T02:04:17Z,2025-11-19T21:16:00Z

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,8,320606217,Sleep Cycle Tracker & Alarm,Sleep Cycle AB,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/sleep-cycle-tracker-alarm/id320606217?uo=4,0.0,4.65289,484,Health & Fitness,"Built on science, Sleep Cycle uses sound analysis to track and improve sleep for over 3 million users worldwide. Our sleep tracker and Smart Alarm clock app help you to identify potential sleep issues, gain valuable insights into your sleep patterns and build a healthier sleep routine.
Sleep Cycle is the world’s no.1 sleep app with more than 40 million downloads. Track your rest, wake refreshed, and build lifelong sleep habits.
AWARDS & RECOGNITIONS

Sleep Cycle has been awarded Best Sleep App in 2024 by Digital Health Magazine and featured as App of the Month in Wellness Today. In 2024, Sleep Cycle won two Merit Healthcare Awards: Gold for Mobile Digital Health Resources and Silver for Best Use of Artificial Intelligence.
WITH SLEEP CYCLE YOU CAN
• Wake up gently during your lightest sleep phase with our Smart Alarm clock.
• Track every night using patented sound technology or accelerometer-based sleep detection, no wearables needed.
• Detect nighttime noises like snoring, coughing, or sleep talking, for a path to quieter sleep.
• Drift off easily using our sleep sounds library of relaxing stories, sleepy soundscapes and guided meditations.
• Understand your sleep patterns with long-term trends and compare your sleep to global benchmarks.
• Log sleep notes to understand how caffeine, stress, or exercise affect your rest.
WHY USE SLEEP CYCLE?
• Wake feeling refreshed with no more groggy mornings.
• Get daily stats to help you understand your rest.
• Health insights with snoring and cough tracking for wellness.
• No gadgets, just place your phone on the nightstand.
• Premium tools like supportive soundscapes, sleep stories, data export, Philips HUE sunrise and Apple Health sync.
ABOUT SLEEP CYCLE

Sleep Cycle helps you sleep smarter. Track your nights, gain valuable insights into your sleep patterns, and wake at just the right time to start the day energized. Sleep Cycle gives you science-backed tools to help you improve your sleep for brighter days.
Our popular features include:
• Superior sleep tracker.
• Smart Alarm clock.
• Sleep talking recorder.
• Advanced sleep analysis.
• Snore tracker.
• Sleep timer.
• Cough recorder.
• Sleep stages.
• Sleep programs.
• SleepGPT.
• Sleep goal and score.
• Relaxing sleep sounds like nature, rain and ocean sounds.
• Sleep Aid including calming meditations and breathing exercises.
• And more features to help you improve your rest.
TALK TO US
If you need any help please contact our customer service at support.sleepcycle.com
JOIN THE COMMUNITY
▶ Web: https://sleepcycle.com/
▶ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sleepcycleapp/
▶ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@sleep_cycle
▶ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/sleepcycle/
Terms & Privacy
https://www.sleepcycle.com/privacy-policy/
DOWNLOAD NOW – Sleep Better with Sleep Cycle",2009-07-23T23:52:39Z,2025-11-23T19:53:42Z

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,10,6670374206,Fitollo Meal Planner & Health,Fitollo Sp. z o.o.,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/fitollo-meal-planner-health/id6670374206?uo=4,0.0,4.56463,441,Health & Fitness,"Have you ever stared at your reflection, wondering why that favorite dress doesn't zip up anymore?
Or caught yourself counting calories at dinner instead of enjoying the company? Maybe you've canceled girls' night out because you're ""on a diet""?
We get it. That's why we created Fitollo - the first meal planner made by women who understand real life doesn't pause for diet plans.
Between work, family, and daily chaos, who has time to count every calorie?

Fitollo isn't just another food tracker - it's your personal weight loss ally that understands women's bodies aren't one-size-fits-all. Your sister might thrive on keto, your friend on intermittent fasting, but YOUR perfect nutrition plan is unique. Our AI creates a custom meal planner just for you, so you can finally lose weight without counting calories.
- A Smart Solution That Understands You -

Fitollo combines food tracking with personalized meal planning to support your weight loss journey. Our system adapts to your lifestyle, making healthy eating enjoyable. Whether you prefer intermittent fasting, keto, or balanced nutrition, we provide the right support.
- Essential Features -
Custom Meal Planner - Personalized diet suggestions based on your goals and preferences. Ready weekly menus with one-tap meal swapping.
Weight Management - Achieve your goals with our proven approach that eliminates calorie counting.
Recipe Collection - 5,000+ delicious recipes tailored to various dietary preferences.

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,12,1114387800,Gym Workout App & Fitness Plan,FITNESS ONLINE MChJ,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/gym-workout-app-fitness-plan/id1114387800?uo=4,0.0,4.81263,4211,Health & Fitness,"Whether you are trying to lose weight, gain muscle mass, rounder buttocks or want to get 6-pack abs – our fitness app offers full body workout plans with many 3D workout exercises for free. Here you will find ready workouts with champions’ diets.

You can choose from a variety of exercise plans for muscle groups, such as chest workout or arm workout, or for a certain goal, such as fat burning workout. You can also choose between workout for women, workout for men and get ready workouts with diet.

This fitness application beats other fitness apps, because you can keep your personal workout diary and find the best personal coach from any city for online fitness workouts and bodybuilding sessions. Share your progress, ask questions about workouts, exercises and diet – you will get competent answers. Together you can keep fit at home!
Main advantages of Fitness Online:

column2: Ready workouts with a diet plan created by bodybuilding champions who act as coaches.
Workout diary: Record your progress with our workout tracker, diet tracker and fitness tracker!
In-App Encyclopaedia: Learn more about exercises and diet.
Over 850 exercises with high-quality 3D animations.
Diet plan: Over 5000 food products with nutrition facts, calorie counter and food tracker.
Sports nutrition: Essential additives to your diet for fast muscle building (gain weight).
Personal feed: Share workouts, ask questions, meet other users of our community.

Direct message our coaches using the in-app chat. Send tips to your friends on how to lose weight, get perfect abs, workout arms and chest, maintain a healthy diet or get a rounder butt through the best buttock exercises.

column1: How does it work?

As a fitness user you can work out by developing your own weight loss program from the exercise library, use our calorie tracker and nutrition guide to create a diet plan and start working out. You can track results in the workout diary. Or choose a ready training program with a diet for your goal, like lifting weights workout, fat loss workout, etc.

You want more? Hire and work out online with a personal coach. Choose your personal trainer by budget and feedback, contact them and set sports goals. Get an invoice, pay with your bank card and start your exercises.

Your coach will give you a workout plan with individual diet instructions, create a monthly course with a full set of exercises and meal plan to reach your goal, whether that is to get a bigger butt, lose weight, lose belly fat, build muscles, get six-pack abs, get a shredded body, get big arms or a wide chest or get fit after a pregnancy – all with fitness at home.
With a monthly course, such as a weight loss program, your coach will monitor your results for a monthly fee, give advice on your form or meal plan and adjust the exercise program if needed.

We only invite the best fitness coaches to Fitness Online with knowledge on all working out goals, like trying to get a rounder butt at home, lose weight fast, get six-pack abs, get big arms, get a wide back, build muscles or just define your body.
Subscription Details:

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,13,1493500777,Mi Fitness (Xiaomi Wear Lite),"Beijing Xiaomi Co., Ltd",https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/mi-fitness-xiaomi-wear-lite/id1493500777?uo=4,0.0,4.5731,26479,Health & Fitness,"Combining Mi Fitness with smartwatch or smartband devices, users can track their health and fitness data.
Mi Fitness supported：Xiaomi Watch Series, Redmi Watch Series, Xiaomi Smart Band Series, Redmi Smart Band Series.
Keep track of your workouts
Map your route, monitor your progress, and achieve your goals. Whether it's walking, running, or biking, you can easily track it right from your phone.
Monitor your health information*

Mi Fitness APP assists you in managing your personal health, helping you to always maintain your optimal state. By connecting Xiaomi or Redmi smartwatch/band devices, important health indicators such as heart rate, sleep, stress, and energy can be monitored and risk warnings generated throughout the day. Health data such as weight and women's health can also be manually recorded and managed.
Sleep better*

In conjunction with Xiaomi or Redmi smartwatch/band devices that has sleep monitoring functionality, you can record your sleep information every night. By conducting in-depth analysis of the different stages of sleep, including deep sleep, light sleep, and rapid eye movement, as well as monitoring your sleep heart rate, breathing quality, body movements, and other sleep-related data, the device generates a personalized sleep report. This report can help remind you to adjust your sleep habits in a timely manner.
Easy payments with wearable device
Link your Mastercard cards to Mi Fitness and enjoy the convenience of making payments on the go with your wearable device.
Ask Alexa for convenient access
With Alexa, you can easily access important features like checking the weather, playing music, and starting a workout. Just ask and you're good to go.
Stay informed with notifications
Receive notifications, messages, and emails directly on your wearable device, so you can stay informed without having to constantly check your phone.
*Disclaimer

Except for the manual health information recording service provided to users, all other health services within the application only synchronize and record the relevant information of the wristband or watch. All health-related data, results, suggestions, etc. are for reference only and are not intended for medical purposes, including self-diagnosis or consultation with a doctor, and are only used for general fitness and health purposes.

Please note that all smartwatches/fitness trackers currently integrated into the application are not medical devices and cannot provide any form of medical services. In case of any physical discomfort, please seek timely advice from medical institutions.",2020-07-08T07:00:00Z,2025-11-17T11:26:23Z

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,18,1478394131,CityFit,CRM RESOURCES SP Z O O,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/cityfit/id1478394131?uo=4,0.0,4.42192,1204,Health & Fitness,"Trenuj, oszczędzaj i śledź swój progres.
Darmowa aplikacja CityFit – wszystko czego potrzebuje Twoje ciało w Twoim smartfonie.
Apka pomoże Ci w realizacji celów na każdym etapie Twoich zmagań.
Bierzesz się za siebie?

Karnet możesz kupić wygodnie w aplikacji. Apka zastępuje tradycyjną kartę członkowską. Wchodź do klubu kiedy chcesz 24/7. Z aplikacją CityFit możesz ćwiczyć nawet w nocy, po godzinach pracy obsługi. Wystarczy, że zeskanujesz kod QR.
Przyda Ci się wsparcie trenera? Znajdziesz go w aplikacji CityFit. Możesz sprawdzić grafik, zapoznać się z sylwetką trenera i zarezerwować trening. Szybko, łatwo i intuicyjnie.
Planujesz zacząć na poważnie? Pomagamy. W aplikacji CityFit masz dostęp do planów treningowych i dietetycznych stworzonych przez naszych specjalistów. Wszystko za free.
Wolisz ćwiczenia w grupie? Apka pozwala w łatwy sposób zapisać się i wypisać z zajęć grupowych. Możesz podejrzeć grafik, prowadzących a nawet frekwencję.
Jesteś wytrwały?
Śledź postępy w aplikacji CityFit. Znajdziesz tu swoje statystyki treningowe. Liczba treningów, ulubione dni treningowe, czas spędzony w klubie. To wszystko możesz sprawdzić za pomocą smartfona.

Bądź z nami w stałym kontakcie. W skrzynce wiadomości znajdziesz najważniejsze informacje dotyczące Twojego klubu, wskazówki treningowe, sprawy organizacyjne i niespodzianki. Zaglądaj do skrzynki i bądź na bieżąco.
Motywujesz innych?
Polecaj CityFit i płać mniej za swój karnet. Zaproś znajomego do CityFit i zgarnij stały rabat 10 zł. Twój znajomy dostanie 10 zł na pierwszy miesiąc. Win-win.

Wygodnie zarządzaj swoim członkostwem. W aplikacji podejrzysz swoje rozliczenia. Znajdziesz kod do wejścia nocnego i zarejestrujesz pakiet sportowy. Potrzebujesz pomocy? Przydatne numery znajdziesz w zakładce „Profil”.
Pobierz aplikację i zacznij zdrowy styl życia. A jeśli apka Ci się spodoba, oceń nas.",2019-10-28T07:00:00Z,2025-11-20T09:29:34Z

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,21,1474161008,Thera Journaling Mental Health,Thera Inc.,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/thera-journaling-mental-health/id1474161008?uo=4,0.0,4.88119,101,Health & Fitness,"Thera – your personal mental health tracker and your diary with a fingerprint lock. One of the most helpful anxiety relief apps. Use Thera as your mood diary, daily emotion tracker, and gratitude app. Try the mood board and other writing practices to become mentally strong and self-confident.
Be aware of your wishes. Fight against your anxiety. Don’t give up your life to fears. Learn to be happy!

Journaling is a great tool to promote self-development and look after your mental health. Thera is a diary with a fingerprint lock, which guarantees complete confidentiality. Your records are stored only on your phone.
Wishes Journal & Diary
Having goals and wishes is essential for your mental health and well-being:
- Create your own list of goals and wishes.
- See how many points it takes to reach the set goal.
- Archive of fulfilled desires.
- Random Wish List - 700+ simple wishes to help bring zest back into your life.
Gratitude Journal & Diary
Practice gratitude to restore and strengthen your mental health and balance. Gratitude app has three sections:
- Thanking yourself, the world, and others.

Start noticing the beauty in small things by focusing on the positive moments. Stop obsessing over your failures. When you get used to saying thanks for the good things in life, thank the world for the challenges that make you stronger.
Fears Journal & Diary
Fear is detrimental to your mental health. But such obstacles are inevitable on the way to achieving your dreams and completing plans.
- Write down your anxious thoughts and concerns
- Analyze your fears
- Think about the confidence boost you’ll get when you overcome your fears
- Think about the possibility of moving towards set goals
You will clearly see how your fears slow you down and prevent you from becoming happier.  Understand what steps you need to take. Transform your fears into action!
Mood journal & diary
Feeling emotions means living. Controlling emotions means controlling your life. This daily emotion tracker will help you analyze your mood and emotional well-being:
- Express your mood.
- Choose the emotions you are feeling from a mood board and develop your emotional intelligence.
- Analyze your emotions - leading questions will help you analyze your mental state and emotions in detail.
Your personal mental health tracker will help you:
- understand your mood and understand what exactly affects it
- develop your emotional intelligence: learn how to recognize your emotions, control them, and focus on the positive
- lower your anxiety level
- increase self-awareness and strengthen your mental health
Here is one of the feedbacks our support regularly receives:
Jessica

I tried many anxiety relief apps. This one is great help for me, with its mental health tracker, its highly confidential diary with fingerprint lock, its mood diary, and daily emotion tracker with a wide range of emojis on the mood board. And with its gratitude app diary!
SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION
Thera offers a subscription plan that gives you a more personalized experience and unlimited access to the entire app.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
For more information, please visit: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

pl,Poland,Health & Fitness,6013,25,1054978020,eFitnessApp,eFitness S.A.,https://apps.apple.com/pl/app/efitnessapp/id1054978020?uo=4,0.0,4.83991,10244,Health & Fitness,"A mobile application for members of a fitness club, gym, CrossFit boxes dance and yoga studios.
The main functionalities of the eFitness App are:

News and information about the club - the user can check the club's opening hours and contact details. The ""News"" module may contain articles about fitness and lifestyle or information about the promotional offer available in the club.

Schedule - allows users to easily search for classes by type and instructor. The member can read the description of the classes and the instructor and see the number of vacancies. The app allows club members to sign up for activities they love. It is also possible to cancel a reservation or sign up for a waiting list when the subscription limit has been reached. Additionally, the user can check a list of activities in which he participated and those for which he is enrolled.

Membership and payments - allows you to purchase a membership directly via your smartphone. The user can manage the membership from the application, freeze it, pay installments and have access to the agreement history. It is also possible to purchase additional services available in the club (e.g. personal training or dietary consultation).
Activity - monitors the club member's activity in a given month. Here you will find information about the number of entries to the club, the number and hours of classes attended by the club member.
Profile - for even better monitoring of training progress, the member can enter his measurements like weight, height and BMI.
Contact with club staff - the application allows you to quickly contact the club staff.

Notifications and offers - it is possible to receive push notifications and offers from the application level. These may be reminders of upcoming classes for which the user signed up or information about the special offer in the club.",2016-05-19T18:36:50Z,2025-05-28T07:14:05Z
